pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nearest Neighbour Search with Variables on a Torus // Finds the k nearest neighbours in a dataset of specified points, adding the option to wrap certain variables on a torus. The user chooses the algorithm to use to find the nearest neighbours. Two such algorithms, provided by the packages 'RANN' https://cran.r-project.org/package=RANN, and 'nabor' https://cran.r-project.org/package=nabor, are suggested.
